@MackerOnTheMed Busy today dude. Will do later. I'm behind on the 22 press-up challenge too! Thanks for nominating me 👍🏽
Loving the Refugee team... For once the IOC got something right ✌🏽️ #Rio2016 #OlympicGames #OpeningCeremony #Brasil https://t.co/GYAKLt2DUQ
@MackerOnTheMed Good point although I'm actually referring to the post-2007 period when Paddy ushered in what is a golden era of major wins!
@MackerOnTheMed Many of the Euros won their first majors while playing in Europe. Westy's game & marriage left him after moving Stateside!
@MackerOnTheMed Sergio is fun n bubbly & has changed + has got game so I figure he'll win a couple. Westy a better person now, so let's see!
@MackerOnTheMed Compare Westy/Sergio/Bjørn/Monty to Paddy/Rose/Stenson/Willett/Rory/GMac/Kaymer: Often negative/moaners vs positive/fun ppl!
@MackerOnTheMed hahaha. Depends on his attitude. I've got a theory about this. Follows in next tweet...
@MackerOnTheMed He's putting it behind him still I think. Not quite there. Hard work this winter and I think we'll see Westy contending...
@MackerOnTheMed I'd love to see more ensemble majors like The Open 2015; lots of big guns, oldies and a talented amateur or two duke it out!
@MackerOnTheMed hahaha. Maybe we'll end up liking TWD. Now he's a Major champ there'll be more interviews & hell contend in future.
@MackerOnTheMed In my view Sergio's as good as Spieth & Day. Scar tissue is why he hasn't achieved. If he wins one soon, more will follow.
@MackerOnTheMed bahahaha. I bet he'd block you for saying that 😂😂😂
RT @MackerOnTheMed: @paolobrand what we witnessed at Troon may happen again in our lifetime we'd b lucky 2 see 2 class acts going at it lik…
@MackerOnTheMed Then again, I'd derive Machiavellian pleasure seeing a majorless legend like Sergio or Westy take down Glue mano-a-mano ⚡️⚔💥
@MackerOnTheMed So true! In future I think we'd both love to see Rory vs Glue, with a side dish of Day.
@MackerOnTheMed Hope we get 4 repeats of Troon next summer, with different winners each time. *hint hint*

🇪🇺✊: https://t.co/sACevKscuL
@MackerOnTheMed Haha defo won't forget! 💙💛
@MackerOnTheMed ...At least a real no name (Streb, McGirt) didn't win it! I'd like to see a Euro Johnny-come-lately like Donaldson win one!
Great Top 10s @Paul_Casey @thatton91. Hope you guys push on & challenge for the big prizes in@2017. If #JimmyWalker can do it, so can you 👍🏽
@MackerOnTheMed Can't believe The Walking Dead won!? This world is heading for its doom man 🙈 Count Dracula is taking over! #PGAChamp
Well played again @henrikstenson. Just wish you'd holed those 4x 5-10 footers you gave yourself. Result might've been diff't. Enjoy the R&R!
@JDayGolf is a helluva champion. He wasn't dialled in this afternoon but when he had to produce he did. More majors soon JD! 🇦🇺 #PGAChamp
Great finish to a rather up and down #PGAChampionship. Jimmy Walker was pretty lucky at times: a lack of pressure until the end.
What a putt @JDayGolf! Over to you Jimmy. Cmon Aussie! 🇦🇺 #USPGA #PGAChampionship
I want to know why #Yanks are always the lucky ones? Why don't Sergio/Westy/Casey/Luke/Poults/Monty/Jiménez/Bjørn have that luck? #USPGA
See what I mean? That putt was missing all the way and yet somehow it curved in. How lucky can you get? #JimmyWalker #USPGA #PGAChamp
#JimmyWalker is lucky. Lucky draw, lucky breaks, holed bunker shot, long putts, tired Stenson, unwell Day. The list goes on #PGAChamp #USPGA
They're making it too easy for #JimmyWalker. They just haven't applied much pressure at any time. When they got close, they didn't push.
@MackerOnTheMed True although Rory has done it many times when it counts. 4-time Major Champion. The others frustrate me.
Will #JimmyWalker's luck run out down the stretch? #USPGA #PGAChamp
@suarez7_legend Hah yeah he looks tired. This weather & draw has played into Walker's hands like a dream. He's got lucky yet has made putts.
This #USPGA is frustrating. Jimmy Walker has shown signs of vulnerability but the world's best haven't applied any pressure 😬 #PGAChamp
@suarez7_legend We did. He really coughed up that hole. Thought he'd go for this but he's clearly shattered after the last two weeks!
@MackerOnTheMed He's been solid but lucky too. Why the hell can't Sergio, Westy, Casey, Luke, Poults, Monty, Jiménez, Bjørn etc do this?! 🙄
@MackerOnTheMed Dear old #HidekiMaysuyama is as bad at putting as Westy, Casey etc; just can't hole any! Bless 😊 #USPGA #bbcgolf #PGAChamp
@MackerOnTheMed There's still time...
@MackerOnTheMed @ShamoonHafez hahaha. They're bored into submission by Jimmy Walker. What a dull person & player, lucky bunker shots apart 🙄
@MackerOnTheMed He will I'm pretty sure. The others aren't exactly making him work hard for it tho are they? I thought they'd go after him!
@MackerOnTheMed So at least TWD is a decent player. Hopefully he proves us wrong & contends many times in future (tho without winning 😉)...
@suarez7_legend Hoping he can pull it off down the stretch. It's time right now...
@MackerOnTheMed Definitely! I just don't see Walker as a major champion. He's not even contended. Surely nerves'll do him down the stretch 😉
@MackerOnTheMed Thoughts? #USPGA
Jimmy Walker a major champion? I don't see it. The stretch will deliver a much better winner... #USPGA #PGAChampionship
Someone's gonna steal this over the closing holes... #USPGA #PGAChampionship
Really hope @martinkaymer can inspire @henrikstenson to a #USPGA-winning final round here. Not many better partners 🇸🇪🇩🇪 #PGAChampionship
Hoping @padraig_h, @Paul_Casey & Tyrell Hatton can bring our islands some Top 10 cheer. Not been a great #USPGA for us tbh. Yet Henrik... 😉
Congrats @jutanugarn. A superb #WomensBritishOpen win & a Thai major champion at last! Hope this inspires more #Thai people to play golf 🇹🇭
@PGAChampionship your leaderboard has serious issues. Now being fixed but why not earlier? I emailed. #PGAChamp #PGA https://t.co/ujxUoXCUgF
Utterly a-mazing shot by @padraig_h at 7! Brilliant blast of a plugged ball to within two feet. Wow! 😳 #USPGA #PGAChamp
Hoping for a #JasonDay vs #HenrikStenson final round shootout for the #USPGA. Maybe a side dish of #MartinKaymer too 😉 #PGAChampionship
@PGAcom are making a hash of #PGAChampionship decision-making. Same tee times, twosomes, single tee start. They're hoping for luck! #USPGA
#BlackLivesMatter. Always have done, always will do.
@paolobrand I foresee Henrik gets moving on #MovingDay. A few others will break from the pack. Streb & Walker to wilt #PGAChampionship #PGA
@paolobrand Yup, thinking the same. Once Big Henrik gets going, he'll steamroller the fragile leaders.
This is turning out to be a poor #PGAChampionship for the Brits & Europeans 🙄 Still, Henrik or Kaymer could win it 🤔 #USPGA #bbcgolf
@MackerOnTheMed Enjoying Jason Day take the course apart this afternoon though. Great to see Grillo too; wonder if he'll cook TWD's bacon? 😉
@MackerOnTheMed TWD is all over the place! Henrik, Martin & co will have his pale hide for lunch tomorrow!
@MackerOnTheMed Just hope he crumbles tomorrow. He's the kinda complete nobody that golf fans dread wining big ones!
@MackerOnTheMed Actually based on the last three holes TWD looks rather nervous. He won't get away with this tomorrow and Sunday...
@MackerOnTheMed hahaha. At least Fatrick is likely to be a top level player for years. TWD is a journeyman who's near the end of his career!
@MackerOnTheMed Doesn't Walking Dead give you the creeps? He makes my skin crawl man 👿🐛💀👹🕷👻🔮☠⚰🃏
@MackerOnTheMed Bloody hope so. Count Dracula winning a major would mark a new phase of evil in our world 😪
@MackerOnTheMed What's going on with the Walking Dead? Get him off screen! He's ruining this. Surely errors will come? #ByeDracula
@MackerOnTheMed Hope the Euro boys batter the Yanks to Pluto! That's if the Brit lads can't pull sth off. 'Dead & Fatrick annoying me lots 🙈
@MackerOnTheMed Thoughts on #PGAChampionship so far?
